name: Mockuuups Studio
description:
Super-easy mockup generator with over 1000 various scenes. The plugin is packed with everything you need to create product mockups, outstanding marketing materials, even visual content for social media or blog posts.


Instant Preview


Select a frame, and Mockuuups Studio takes care of the rest. The plugin automatically inserts & scales the selected frame into hundreds of previews. Pick your favorite and export the mockup as a file or place it right back into the document.


Custom Scenes with Studio


Pick a device, choose from diverse hands and mix with countless background combinations. Including transparent, colors, gradients, and the Unsplash integration! You can watch our 5-minute walkthrough.


Growing Library


More than 1000 high-quality scenes with various angles, different backgrounds, and device types are accessible from one place - no need to "google" and download mockups anymore.


Well-organized


Easily filter mockups based on your criteria. Are you looking for a scene with a transparent background and the latest version of the iPhone? No problem! Older device to showcase your full portfolio? We got you!


Collection includes more than 1000 scenes with:


iPhone Mockups

Google Pixel Mockups

Samsung Galaxy Mockups

MacBook Mockups

iMac Mockups

iPad Mockups

Microsoft Surface Mockups

Dell Display Mockups

and more...
